hotels.title: SA: Murray River Five-Star Adults-Only Villas
hotels.description: Peaceful and romantic, the tranquil beauty of the Riverland region provides the breathtaking backdrop to one of South Australia's most luxurious stays - The Frames. An intimate five-star collection of just three ultra-modern, adults-only villas, perched on the ochre clifftops by the Murray River, a stay here is an exceptional way to spoil a loved one or spend time with special friends. Daydream in a private hydrotherapy spa or pool, whip up a feast in the fully equipped kitchen or sizzle a gourmet lunch on the state-of-the-art BBQ. Pop open a bottle of wine and lounge in the spacious living area, dine on your private balcony while taking in sweeping sunset vistas across the Murray River or order a range of ultra-luxe in-villa services, from a relaxing massage to one of the Frames' renowned private-chef dinners. Beyond your retreat, explore the majesty of historic Renmark and its breathtaking natural surrounds. Explore the 19th-century township and hop between vineyards and distilleries, including the iconic Twenty Third Street Distillery - a revitalised 100-year-old cellar door producing one of South Australiaâ€™s most loved gins. In between gourmet food and wine, trace the banks of the Murray River creeks and wetlands on a nature stroll or canoe ride.
